name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lloyd J. RAPP, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lloyd J. RAPP, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order and Judgments of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Chester County are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John R. Merrick, Public Defender, Charles M. J. Nester, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
S. Lee Ruslander, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 501
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Lloyd J. RAPP, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 15, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
John R. Merrick, Public Defender, Charles M. J. Nester, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
S. Lee Ruslander, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
